title: malai enat-talai
sahitya:
malai enat-talai nimirvAi jaya vIranE manasAkSi magizhavE tanadATSi tigazhavE


anupallavi

  kalagap-pisAcugaLaik-kaNDittu nIkkavE nilavulaginai deivak-kalai vanam AkkavE


caraNam    saNDai veriyinAlE guNDu pOTTazhivu sheidAnavarai azhittut-tAnE pirar enavE
kaNDuyir-karuNaiyai eNDishaiyilum nATTik-kayilai riSabhapriyan maindan kandanaip-pOl
